# Functions

## Touch & Pain

1. (Mucosa of Posterior Tongue, Tonsil, Middle ear, Nasopharynx, Oropharynx, Carotid Sinus & Body)
1. Superior Glossopharyngeal ganglion
1. [Spinal Trigeminal Tract]({{< var ref-spinal-trigeminal-tract.path >}})
1. [Spinal Trigeminal Nucleus]({{< var ref-spinal-trigeminal-nucleus.path >}})
1. Medial lemniscus (Touch) and Spinal lemniscus (Pain)
1. Sensory cortex
